trans-unit.source: Exposes <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> types to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 向 UI 自动化公开 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 与此自动化对等类关联的元素。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An object that is in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 中与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> 关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的项创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 指定项的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> 的快捷组合键。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key combinations for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> 的快捷键组合。

trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren" /> 调用。

trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName" /> 调用。

trans-unit.target: 描述与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> 关联的元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 指定控件模式的值枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 的控件模式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" />, or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 支持该控件模式的对象，如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" />, <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Scroll" />、 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform" />、 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ItemContainer" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> 值；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Hides all items that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer" /> 中的所有项目。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuButtonAutomationPeer> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 未启用。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 不包含任何项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> can be resized; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以调整 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuButton" /> 的大小，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
